bibl.title: On the Greek Calends.
Proceedings of the XVIII International Congress of Papyrology. II
bibl.author: Rea, John R.

bibl.note: In Greek the Roman New Year celebrations of the Calends of January were known by the simplified name of "the Calends". Revised text of P. Wisc. II, 72 and C.P.R. VIII, 52.
Rea John R., On the Greek Calends.
Proceedings of the XVIII International Congress of Papyrology. II (Athens, 1988) pp. 203-208.
